title: BRIEF-Vector Group CEO Howard M. Lorber's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.6 Million V/s $11.1 Million In 2016
text: March 12, 2018 / 9:06 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Vector Group CEO Howard M. Lorber's 2017 Total Compensation Was $10.6 Million V/s $11.1 Million In 2016 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Vector Group Ltd: * VECTOR GROUP LTD CEO HOWARD M. LORBER'S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $10.6 MILLION VERSUS $11.1 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING‍​ Source text ( bit.ly/2FzpTV6 ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
